hangle: 만약 영애의 아버지가 억지로 시킨 거라면 방으로 돌아가.
first_translate: if your father  forced you into this, go back to your room now.
I’m doing all of this because I want to, your highness.
it’s not like me to say things like this about myself,
but don’t you think that I’d make quite a good wife for you?

hangle: 여태 어디서 거절당한 경험이 한 번도 없답니다.
first_translate: I’ve never been rejected by anyone before.
but there is no other woman besides fiona whom I care about.

hangle: 피오나 외의 여자는 아무런 의미도 없어.
first_translate: but there is no other woman besides fiona whom I care about.
this gives me such a headache.

hangle: 차라리 암살자였으면 두 동강을 냈을 텐데.
first_translate: had she been an assassin, I would have cut her down without hesitation.

hangle: 게다가 피오나가 잔소리 한 것도 있고…
first_translate: not only that, but fiona was nagging at me earlier too...
either they leave or I do.

hangle: 세상에, 우리 황자님이 출세를 하긴 했나 보네!
first_translate: wow! looks like our little prince has become popular!
I knew something like this would happen...
still, what courage on her part!
to do something as bold as that!

hangle: 그 조그맣던 애가 이렇게 될 줄 누가…
first_translate: who could imagine that tiny kid growing up to--
scaring someone usually helps get rid of hiccups...
you can just scare me already.

hangle: 사귀는 사이에 키스 정도로 이러는 것도 좀…
first_translate: a kiss shouldn’t cause such a reaction when we are dating...

hangle: 꼭 내가 사냥감이 된 기분이 드는데…
first_translate: I feel like his prey right now...
all I wanted to do was give you a peck.
I’ll hit you if you keep going.

hangle: 나도 이 이상은 참기 힘들어서 안 할 거야.
first_translate: I wouldn’t dare since even I am having trouble holding back.
the hiccuping stopped, so I’ll head out now.
feel like I might start looking forward to tomorrow.
there will be a tea party held in the greenhouse today.
wonder if I’ll see her then.
